There aren't any explanations on how to apply the FCS2 SN workaround...

Easy: look for the Final Cut Studio System ID file on your hard drive (use spotlight) or get to it manually from the Finder in Library/Application Support/ProApps/Final Cut Studio System ID

Now replace the Final Cut Studio System ID file with the one provided here. Enter the serial number once when you start your applications the first time. That's it! Worked for me!

Great workaround! Works fine to solve a small (yet annoying problem).

ps. I will be posting the full version of final cut studio 2.0 (about 50 gigs) in a couple of days (takes time to create the torrent file)... anyone interested?

Quick Tutorial:

1: Download Final Cut Studio (No Content)
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/3825017/FINAL_CUT_STUDIO_2

2: Download THIS Motion 3 Content

3: Install Final Cut Studio (ONLY Motion!)

4: When it asks for a serial number type in the serial at: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/3825017/FINAL_CUT_STUDIO_2

5: When it asks for Motion Content enter virtual or real disk of THIS torrent.

6: Install and Enjoy!
